name: Memrise for Japanese, inspired by ShadowDrgn
description: Some personalized (and probably opinionated) tweaks to Memrise for learning Japanese. Use Japanese (not default Chinese) fonts. Make the questions in a bigger font, and put a huge gap between the questions and answers (avoid contamination with multiple-choice). Inspired by ShadowDrgn's contribution from 2012.
additional_info: Inspired by ShadowDrgn. Uses default Japanese fonts available on Mac and PC. Not tested in Linux. If you have a comment or criticism, leave it at https://gist.github.com/fasiha/3cf84b44335d9a82e4f4
